title: mAdhava bhuviyadil
sahitya:
mAdhava bhuviyadil  unadiNaip-padamalar tArakam aladedu hari viTThala viTThalA


anupallavi

  madhura muraLidharA nidam unait-tudi sheyyum aDimaiyum allavO nAn pOdum shOdanai


caraNam    pANDuranga viTThalA bhakta jana priyanE bhavabhaya haraNanE yadukula tilakanE
